sourcesContent:
import * as d3 from 'd3' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Score(userScore) { const [SvgWeight, setSvgWeight] = useState() useEffect(() => { const SvgWeightCreation = d3 .select('.score-box') .attr('width', 250) .attr('height', 250) .attr('class', 'bg-gray-50') .style('border-radius', '5px') .append('circle') .attr('cx', 125) .attr('cy', 125) .attr('r', 85) .attr('fill', 'white') .selectAll('text') setSvgWeight(SvgWeightCreation) }, []) return (
{console.log(userScore.userScore)}
) } export default Score
